overview: Somewhere in new Thailand a place is forced to dream the old Thailand, caught between both within the heated river a overworked boat starts to desperately sing through the water, air and beyond its last breath that evensurely turns into a mechanical unearthly cheap scream... Aware that no one is in pain only it is sure of its destination as somewhere but green. Somewhere blue. Somewhere, Desperately, Sinking, Sickness.
title: I Am Sick
